[lets just say Firearm and Kamodia both saved arcangel]


Arcangel



he sat in the cr are chamber looking down he saw all the mech fluid on him 
and felt mad at himself. he had to have someone else saved him. but he then 
smiled that he killed both rush and Grim Reaper by himself. He then told the 
computer to,


Arcangel:



"computer change body color to half silver ,half blue and upgrade body 
armor."



then he started to sleep while his body was finished getting repaired.


[I don't know if getting your armor upgraded was a mode if it was someone 
please tell me.]
